sentences.en: A flush of lukewarm water washed the pink mucus off my head and body.
sentences.cn: 莲蓬管头里的温水,喷淋在我的头上,新部的血液全冲了下去.

sentences.en: And the swans spent the morning in a lukewarm bath.
sentences.cn: 还有天鹅们在冰冷的浴盆里度过这个早上.

sentences.en: But please wash it in lukewarm soap water and rinse well.
sentences.cn: 在洗的时候,肥皂水的温度要不冷不热,而且要漂洗干净.

sentences.en: Economists have never been more than lukewarm towards him.
sentences.cn: 经济学家对他向来态度冷淡。

sentences.en: His idea got only a lukewarm response from the committee.
sentences.cn: 他的想法只得到了委员会冷淡的反应。
我们的食物只是温乎的。

sentences.en: Polite but lukewarm reviews are the kiss of death for a commercial film.
sentences.cn: 客气而不热情的评论只会葬送一部商业影片.

sentences.en: She sipped some lukewarm coffee from her mug.
sentences.cn: 她抿了几口杯子里温热的咖啡。

sentences.en: She was distinctly lukewarm about my idea.
sentences.cn: 她无疑对我的观点不感兴趣.

sentences.en: The coffee was weak and lukewarm.
sentences.cn: 咖啡寡淡无味，温乎乎的。

sentences.en: The new design only received a lukewarm endorsement from head office.
sentences.cn: 新设计在总部反响平平.

sentences.en: The study received a lukewarm response from the Home Secretary.
sentences.cn: 内政大臣对这项研究反应不是很热烈。

sentences.en: Their lukewarm welcome give me an all over sort of feeling.
sentences.cn: 他们不冷不热的欢迎使我觉得浑身不舒服.

sentences.en: Wash your face with lukewarm water.
We send back the coffee because it is lukewarm.
sentences.cn: 我们把咖啡送回去了,咖啡不够热.

words.tran_cn: 冷淡的；微温的；不够热心的

trans.tran_cn: 冷淡的，微温的，不热心的，温和
trans.tran_en: not showing much interest or excitement
